document_data.name: Essafah al-Qadibi
document_data.mainbody: '''Essafah al-Qadibi''' was a [[Sorcerer (kit)|sorcerer]] who lived in [[Liham]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: Essafah's vanity was only matched by his cowardice. Despite this, he managed to find success on several dangerous assignments.
document_data.Activities: Essafah aided [[holy slayer]]s of [[Hajama]] with his magic. He was a member of the holy slayer faction known as the [[Loyalists]]. He was chosen to lead a few dangerous missions where he swiftly dealt with magically warded opponents, earning him high praise from his fellow Loyalists.
document_data.Possessions: Essafah owned a [[Hat of disguise|''fez of disguise'']].{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Cardsheets}}
